title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/1/19
itunes:title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/1/19
description:
George Noory and authors Lisa Morton and Les Klinger discuss their new collection of ghost stories written by Edgar Allen Poe and other famous writers, and why people enjoy reading scary stories.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

George Noory and authors Lisa Morton and Les Klinger discuss their new collection of ghost stories written by Edgar Allen Poe and other famous writers, and why people enjoy reading scary stories.

itunes:summary: A look at the appeal of some of the most famous ghost stories of all time.
